item.title: 3D Printing a Racing Drone
item.description: We wanted to build a racing drone on a 3D printed frame Pictured: Completed build And I wanted to document it here - the build; the programming bit; the learning to fly bit.. But then we got into it. And I soon realised 3D printing the chassis/frame was actually going to be the easy bit. Drones builds are a massive topic - when you’re starting out. Involved, time consuming, but hugely rewarding, is the best way I can sum it up.
